EmailTemplate.name: 202010_Americas_BGA_Virtual_Operator_Conference_ON24.Email_Invite_All_Sessions
EmailTemplate.subject: 2020 Operator Conference Webinar, Oct. 27-29
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Join your Honeywell Customer Support Managers for a 90-minute webinar on the ins-n-outs of the Aerospace Portal. The Honeywell Aerospace Portal is designed for operators to conduct business seamlessly online including ordering, quotes, self-help technical resources, reporting and much more.
Topics to be covered during webinar:
- Portal-Specific Resources for Operators - Online Training - Tech Pubs & Entitlements - ATS Knowledge Center - Customer Support Manager Q&A
DATE October 27, 2020
TIME 08:00 a.m. MST
LOCATION Online and On-Demand
REGISTER NOW <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2020/10/2020-operator-conference-webinar-americas]]>
Acompañe a su Gerente de Soporte Regional en un recorrido virtual de 90 minutos conociendo el portal Aerospace. El portal está diseñado para que operadores obtengan la información que necesitan en tiempo real y hagan negocios de una manera sencilla. La sesión cubrirá lo relacionado a ordenes, cotizaciones, librería técnica, reportes de horas y mucho más.
Temas por cubrir:
- Funciones Específicas para Operadores - Entrenamientos en Línea - Publicaciones Técnicas - Centro de Conocimiento (ATS Knowledge Center) - Preguntas y Respuestas con su Gerente Regional
DATE October 28, 2020
TIME 08:00 a.m. CST
LOCATION Online and On-Demand
REGÍSTRESE AHORA <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2020/10/2020-operator-conference-webinar-spanish]]>
Junte-se aos gerentes de suporte ao cliente da Honeywell para um webinar de 90 minutos sobre os detalhes do Portal Aeroespacial. O Portal Aeroespacial da Honeywell foi desenvolvido para que os operadores realizem seus negócios on-line, incluindo pedidos, cotações, recursos de auto-ajuda para questionamentos técnicos, reporte de horas voadas e muito mais.
Tópicos a serem abordados durante o webinar:
- Recursos específicos do portal para operadores - Treinamento on-linea - Publicações Técnicass - Centro de conhecimento da ATS (ATS Knowledge Center) - Perguntas e Respostas do Gerente de Suporte ao Cliente
DATE October 29, 2020
TIME 10:00 a.m. Brasilia Time
LOCATION Online and On-Demand
QUERO PARTICPAR! <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2020/10/2020-operator-conference-webinar-portuguese]]>
Join your Honeywell Customer Support Managers for a 90-minute webinar on the ins-n-outs of the Aerospace Portal. The Honeywell Aerospace Portal is designed for operators to conduct business seamlessly online including ordering, quotes, self-help technical resources, reporting and much more.
Topics to be covered during webinar:
- Portal-Specific Resources for Operators - Online Training - Tech Pubs & Entitlements - ATS Knowledge Center - Customer Support Manager Q&A
DATE October 29, 2020
TIME 09:00 a.m. Malaysia Time
LOCATION Online and On-Demand
REGISTER NOW <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2020/10/2020-operator-conference-webinar-apac]]>
